summary:
Coffee Stand DAO - This DAO is a group of members who came together to run a coffee stand.

 Mug NFT for sale - Mint NFTs to drink free cups of coffee at DAO's coffee stand.

 Launch and run a coffee stand - NFT holders, as contributing to the DAO, vote in the Blockchain on the DAO matter, e.g., choosing stand owners or beans, etc.

 Lending for a new coffee stand - Anybody to launch a new coffee stand can rent a certain amount of funds from the DAO to support the early phase of the stand.

 Be the origin of Coffee Lovers - Coffee Stand DAO make the future full of the scent of coffee, by supporting at least 10,000 roasters countrywide
